### ⚠️ Requires [Epoli](https://epoli-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Action On Death

---

_Power Type_

Executes an [Entity Action Type](https://epoli-docs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/powertypes/action_on_death) when the player dies.

Type ID: `epoli:action_on_death`

---

### Examples

```json
{
	"type": "epoli:action_on_death",
	"entity_action": {
		"type": "origins:execute_command",
		"command": "say Deathed"
	},
	"damage_condition": {
		"type": "origins:amount",
		"comparison": ">=",
		"compare_to": 5
	}
}
```
This example will execute the command `say Deathed` on the player when they die and the attacker damage amount is `5` or above.
